title: Trade Uncertainty Saps Optimism, Bank of Canada Surveys Show
description: Bank of Canada surveys show persistent pessimism among firms and consumers as the ongoing US trade war deepens uncertainty.
content: Bank of Canada surveys show persistent pessimism among firms and consumers as the ongoing US trade war deepens uncertainty.
